title: Live Blog: IPL 2017 Auction
text: Delhi Daredevils have a Rs 23.1 crore balance purse 09:05 AM (IST) How will Kolkata Knight Riders spend their Rs 19.75 crore? 09:04 AM (IST) Mumbai Indians have Rs 11.5 crore at their disposal 08:51 AM (IST) 08:50 AM (IST) All set for a busy day This is my workplace for the rest of the day . That little gavel could be busy! #IPLAuction pic.twitter.com/Bq4mwURJqu — Richard Madley (@iplauctioneer) February 20, 2017 08:46 AM (IST) Overseas players to watch out for... 08:40 AM (IST) Pune Supergiants have a new captain 08:37 AM (IST) Stay tuned... Take a look at how the franchises are placed in terms of their budget. VIVO #IPLAuction to begin shortly. Stay tuned pic.twitter.com/QqvnugJwEK — IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) February 20, 2017 08:36 AM (IST) A look the five uncapped Indians at the auction 08:24 AM (IST) — IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) February 20, 2017 08:15 AM (IST) Which players do you think are on defending champions Sunrisers Hyderabad list? 08:13 AM (IST) Click here to know how the franchises may spend 07:58 AM (IST) With this being the last auction in the current set - the retention policy hasn't yet been outlined for the next edition - the focus of most teams will be to plug the holes in their line-up 07:58 AM (IST) The purse for the teams isn't much - Rs. 148.33 crore to be precise - to pick a maximum 77 players, including 29 overseas cricketers 07:57 AM (IST) Much like the format, the auction for the 10th Indian Premier League will be about short-term goals rather than long-term planning and the focus will be on smart spending and cautious purchases 07:55 AM (IST) Welcome to our live coverage of the IPL 2017 auction in which 354 players will go under the hammer From around the web More from The Times of India Recommended By Colombia
